channel.title: Duchess Rework and Princess Changes Version 1.1
channel.description:
# [color=lighblue]Princess[/color] [color=lighBlue]Blue Dragon Investigative[/color] > **Night ability 1: Flirt(Uses: Unlimited)-** limit your target's class type down to 2 options(Same as current ones) **Night ability 2: Will-o-Wisp(Uses: 2)-** Determine your target's faction
> **Day ability 1: Charm(Uses: 2)-** Flirt will determine your target's exact class type.
[details="Notes"]
* To prevent power creep, snoop should be removed from Marshal before this is added.
* To view a copy of a players logs, , the logs will be displayed next to the player's name(where the logs are shown upon death) instead of being displayed above the name list. The icon for snooped logs will remain the same, however.
* If you snoop the same player multiple times then the icon will be put next to their previous logs and a number will appear on it that identifies which is which.
* Dark Wisp is only replaced because Timesnatcher already has Dark Dimension, which is basically Dark Wisp just renamed. If Dark Dimension was replaced/reworked then I would be fine with keeping Dark Wisp for Duchess.
[/details]
# [color=purple]Duchess[/color] [color=purple]Unseen Social[/color]
> **Night Ability 1: Snoop(Uses: 3?)-** Gain a copy of your target's logs. You will be able to view this copy at any time **Night Ability 2: Shroud(Uses: 2)-** Player will appear as chosen class if they are executed tomorrow.
> **Day ability 1: Shred(Uses: 1)-** Erase your target's journal and prevent them from writing in it further. You will gain a copy of it **Day ability 2: Forge(Uses: 1)-** Gain a copy of your target's logs. You will be able to edit this copy at any time. If your target dies, then their logs will be replaced with your edited version.
[details="Changelog"]
[details="Version 1.1"]
* Shroud no longer investigates
[/details]
[/details]
* **Poll-** Do flirt's results need changing
[poll type=regular close=2018-10-12T21:00:00.000Z] * -Yes, the results for flirt should be changed to(post below) * -No, the current flirt results are fine [/poll]
* **Poll-** How many uses should Snoop have?
[poll name=poll2 type=regular close=2018-10-12T21:00:00.000Z] * Unlimited * 3 * 2 * Other(Post below) [/poll]
* **Poll-** Should Shred and Forge only be able to work on players whom you have already snooped?
[poll name=poll3 type=regular close=2018-10-12T21:00:00.000Z] * Yes * No [/poll]

item.title: Duchess Rework and Princess Changes Version 1.1
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
You already heard my argument against Shread.

Otherwise looks good.

RHCube:

How many uses should Snoop have?

3 is fine

RHCube:

Should Forge only work on players whom you have already snooped?

Yes. And it should only be updated to the point that you have snooped

Read full topic
item.source: Duchess Rework and Princess Changes Version 1.1

item.title: Duchess Rework and Princess Changes Version 1.1
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
Would this be good then:

Duchess

Unseen Social

Night Ability 1: Bat Eyelashes(Uses: Unlimited)- Determine your target’s faction and class type.
Night Ability 2: Snoop(Uses: 3)- Gain a copy of your target’s logs. You will be able to view this copy at any time

Day ability 1: Shred(Uses: 1)- Erase your target’s journal and prevent them from writing in it further. You will gain a copy of it
Day ability 2: Forge(Uses: 1)- Gain a copy of your target’s logs. You will be able to edit this copy at any time. If your target dies, then their logs will be replaced with your edited version.

Also, 2 more questions:
How many uses should Snoop have? and
Should Forge only work on players whom you have already snooped?

Read full topic
item.source: Duchess Rework and Princess Changes Version 1.1

You are overcomplicating things. Converted princess should have a flirt esc ability

item.source: Duchess Rework and Princess Changes Version 1.1

item.title: Duchess Rework and Princess Changes Version 1.1
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
orangeandblack5:

If anything Duchess should be a bit stronger than Marshal

Firelitten:

That’s not the solution,

NuclearBurrito:

Second of all I don’t think Shroud particularly fits on Duchess.

Here’s another solution/replacement:
Reduce Snoop’s uses to 2(Or keep it the same. Not sure about this. It could even be reduced to 1 use if it’s still strong), and replace Shroud with this:

Night ability 2: Write(Uses: Unilited)- Gain an additional use of Snoop.

Note: I am also not sure if you should be able to decide between an additional use of Forge, Shred, or Snoop. If you could choose Forge or Shred their there initial uses could be reduced to 0.

NuclearBurrito:

Could work better as a mental blur rework maybe?

That could work, I would just like to see Disguise(or at least a version of it) on an unseen class.

NuclearBurrito:

Because making it instant just gives it the additional effect of outing you.

Not always. I included it so scum would have an excuse for not keeping logs. And it wouldn’t instantly out you if it was given to another neutral class(scorned?)

NuclearBurrito:

Any additional utility it could have is easily countered by PN besides preventing a log reveal on death

Fair

Note: I’m not against removing it, I’m just saying why I created it

Read full topic
item.source: Duchess Rework and Princess Changes Version 1.1

item.title: Duchess Rework and Princess Changes Version 1.1
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
RHCube:

How? Shred is instant while Forge is only upon death. Different uses.

Because making it instant just gives it the additional effect of outing you. Any additional utility it could have is easily countered by PN besides preventing a log reveal on death. Thus Forge is simply better in every situation

Read full topic
item.source: Duchess Rework and Princess Changes Version 1.1

item.title: Duchess Rework and Princess Changes Version 1.1
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

First of all Shread is redundant

How? Shred is instant while Forge is only upon death. Different uses.

NuclearBurrito:

Anyways instead just have it be a buffed bat eyelashes. Learn type and faction, unlimited uses

Alright, sounds good

Read full topic
item.source: Duchess Rework and Princess Changes Version 1.1

item.title: Duchess Rework and Princess Changes Version 1.1
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Few things:

1st of all. Princess looks good. Nice job. You have already mentioned wanting to rework Window Peek so I won’t worry about that aspect

However duchess has a few problems.

First of all Shread is redundant. Remove it and give forge a second use

Second of all I don’t think Shroud particularly fits on Duchess. Could work better as a mental blur rework maybe?

Anyways instead just have it be a buffed bat eyelashes. Learn type and faction, unlimited uses

Read full topic

item.title: Duchess Rework and Princess Changes Version 1.1
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
That’s probably too far

I say “a bit” and I mean just that

If you look too much at power disparity it can take precedence to convert a weak class over whoever would be best for controlling daytime discussion

You must find balance.

Read full topic
item.source: Duchess Rework and Princess Changes Version 1.1

item.title: Duchess Rework and Princess Changes Version 1.1
item.dc:creator: Marcus_Doodalee
item.description:
orangeandblack5:

It’s actually atrocious on BD

Agreed

orangeandblack5:

t’s just a superbuffed way to get a class and usually all night results, often lumping in players’ speculations as well. Basically, it can kinda read your mind.

Which is often not particularly useful for evils, but it is sometimes

orangeandblack5:

maybe you think that’s good because it discourages putting critical information in wills

I think if BD is even made to consider leaving out critical infomation in their logs something is wrong.

orangeandblack5:

Basically, there are better ways to do what Snoop does that don’t attempt to force putting things you want hidden in Private Notes over your will, and better ways to mess with people’s trust in wills.

I totally agree with this conclusion. However I don’t think Marshal need an alternative to snoop because its purpose and usage over say, probe, is you can find allies/NK through it in my opinion.

Read full topic

If anything Duchess should be a bit stronger than Marshal

Removing a Sheriff is on average better than removing a Princess

item.source: Duchess Rework and Princess Changes Version 1.1

item.title: Duchess Rework and Princess Changes Version 1.1
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
Firelitten:

See if x and y are the same class type?

That could work

Sam17z:

If you want to change duchess go for it, but I think princess doesn’t need a buff

Alright, but are the duchess changes good?

Ellie:

RH, weren’t you one of the people complaining that Timesnatcher had Dark Wisp?

Yes, but only because they are the exact same ability. And I made will-o-wisp a faction check because I want to see Window Peek get charged so it determines what classes visit your target.

orangeandblack5:

Why is this better than Marshal having Snoop

Because Marshal is a better Duchess in almost every way.

Sam17z:

#remove snoop. It’s a worse version of marshal probe

What’s wrong with a scum class having Snoop? Sure, probe determines the exact class of BD, but Snoop can learn what it’s target did during previous nights. That’s strong

Sam17z:

And sometimes the class which the person has is different from their logs.

Only for Neuts/Scum though. The only BD that should ever use another claim is Hunter.

Sam17z:

Also snoop encourages people to have their logs in their pm’s if they gave snoop to duchess

PMs aren’t displayed to the entire court upon death though.

orangeandblack5:

moved

To make Duchess different from Marshal

Read full topic
item.source: Duchess Rework and Princess Changes Version 1.1
